question:
Arrange chronologically the following viceroys of India according to their tenure
1. Lord Reading
2. Lord Chelmsford
3. Lord Linlithgow
4. Lord Irwin
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Tenure of the viceroys- Lord Chelmsford (1916-21), Lord Reading (1921-26), Lord Irwin (1926-31), Lord Wellingdon (1931-36).
